headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: digital currency Bitcoin gets Europe banking approval
text: This week on Tech Weekly with Aleks Krotoski, we meet the CEO and founder of Shutterstock.com Jon Oringer. Jon talks to Guardian technology editor Charles Arthur about his data-driven twist on the photo-library business and why cheap high-quality cameras are allowing both photographers and commercial customers to do business in a very different way. Aleks and Charles discuss the impending Christmas battle of the tablets and why a small town Australian police force is furious with Apple maps. And Pierre Noizat from Bitcoin.org discusses its peer-to-peer currency.
